alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Sanpete Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Sanpete...east central Juab...southwestern Salt Lake...Utah and east central Tooele Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 456 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds associated with showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Tooele Army Depot to 9 miles northeast of Nephi. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Provo, Tooele, Payson, Orem, Lehi, Riverton, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Springville, American Fork, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Lindon, Santaquin, Mapleton, Bluffdale, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills and Rocky Ridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 231 and 286. US Route 6 between mile markers 142 and 197. US Route 89 between mile markers 296 and 312. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
